analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BitImageTokenSale.purchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#677-716):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(token.owner(),_investor,tokenAmount)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#710-712)
	External calls sending eth:
	- walletEhterCrowdsale.transfer(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonus (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol)
	- period (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol)
	- startTime (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol)

Reentrancy in BitImageTokenSale.refund (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#664-677):
	External calls:
	- token.burnFrom(msg.sender,investor.tokenBuyed) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#672)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(investor.weiContributed) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#671-672)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investors (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#672-673)

BitImageTokenSale.setToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#583-599) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.totalSupply() == tokenIcoAllocated.add(tokenTeamAllocated).add(tokenAdvisorsAllocated).add(tokenBountyAllocated).add(tokenReservationAllocated))

Reentrancy in BitImageTokenSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#623-659):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(token.owner(),walletTokenBounty,tokenBountyAllocated)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#630-631)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(token.owner(),walletTokenReservation,tokenReservationAllocated)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#631-636)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(token.owner(),walletTokenTeam,tokenTeamAllocated)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#636-642)
	- token.lock(walletTokenReservation,now + 110376000) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#642-644)
	- token.lock(walletTokenTeam,now + 220752000) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#644-645)
	- token.release() (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#657)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#657-658)

BitImageTokenSale.finalize has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(token.owner(),walletTokenAdvisors[i],tokenAdvisor)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#651-654)

BitImageTokenSale.finalize has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.lock(walletTokenAdvisors[i],now + 110376000) (/unique_chucks/11/0x620331d1aedf17a6090a938bbcd90b2ce3831b46.sol#654-656)
